item.description:
Any questions incubators! Let me know! Showtime is at 8pm so come on out! We'll be hanging out afterwards as well and can surely throw in some improv games.

Thanks for all the support the last few weeks at other performance by me and other incubators!

I now return you to our regularly scheduled incubator, well next week at least.

Cheers!

Jason
item.why: Apologies that the thing keeps setting to AM for these times. Something weird with meetup. Put come check out the show tonight at 8pm at Somerville Theater in Davis!
item.name: Lost Marbles at Somerville Theater in Davis Square 8pm Thursday!
